body:
The memory instability appears to be fixed at tip. There's still a performance regression and the binaries are still bigger.

```

4.55 3036348
4.66 3036348

4.49 3036348

tip (bea9ae2 linux/amd64)

8.76 2947704
7.93 2947700
8.43 2947748
7.32 2947688
```
